summary: Charlie Chan investigates apparent poisonings at a mystery mansion in the Mojave Desert.
cast: Sidney Toler|Arleen Whelan|Richard Derr|Douglass Dumbrille|Henry Daniell|Edmund MacDonald|Victor Sen Yung|Lenita Lane|Ethel Griffies|Milton Parsons|Steven Geray|Lucien Littlefield|Oliver Blake|George Chandler|Paul Kruger|Tex Phelps|Eric Wilton
title: Castle in the Desert
